Public NotInheritable Class WorkflowCompilerResults Inherits CompilerResults

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Represents the results of a workflow compilation. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to set the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerResults> class, and assumes that `results` is of type <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerResults>, which is created earlier in the file. The code also creates new instances of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompiler> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerParameters> classes and sets some values. This code example is part of the Outlook Workflow Wizard SDK Sample from the WizardForm.cs file. For more information, see [Outlook Workflow Wizard](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b2ba92b-8456-43f3-87fc-184ffdec4408).
[!code-csharp[WF_Samples#99](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#99)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#99](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#99)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CompiledUnit As CodeCompileUnit

Docs.summary: Gets the that was produced during compilation of the workflow.
